name: Little Wolf Chef | N64
description:
Little Wolf Chef

This game was made in just 3 days for the "Lost Cartridge" game jam for the Nintendo 64 system! I'm 20 years old and I did it all by myself!


Little wolf chef, is a 3D platform game, where you have to prepare a sandwich for the king in less than 5 minutes, can you make it perfect?
I put a lot of love into the game, I hope you enjoy it! Credits

3D Models: By me

Art: By me

Animations: By Me

C# Code: By Me

Textures: By Me

UI: By Me

Shader: Unity, Toony Colours Demo, by Jean Moreno

Fonts:Good Dog Plain, Milky Nice

Sounds: Generic Free sounds from Youtube, and Mix by me

Soundtrack: Free to use soundrack youtube "Music For Video Library", By 2BStudio

Engine: Unity 2019

Game Name: Little Wolf Chef

Solo dev From Argentina - Blocky- ThomasLeon 2022

Made it for Lost Cartridge Jam 4 in 3 days


Take a look at my main game and you can follow me if you liked the game!
